changelog:
new:
- added aptx libs 
- new vibration pattern (from miui)
- Extended audio menu
- build is no longer userdebug

fixed:
- hotspot
- fix pixelation round the notch
- fixed some weird sysui bug on lockscreen
- fixed proximity sensor acting weird 
 
Improvements:
- memory optimization (CAF)
- battery improvements
- systemui themes updated
- update translations
- ambient play improvements
- screen wakeup is faster

Kernel:
- bringup simple kernel 1.1 (custom kernel by me)
- add fsync control
- tuned up schedutil 
- less frequency locking
